eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Benewah; Bonner; Boundary; Clearwater; Idaho; Kootenai; Latah; Lewis; Nez Perce; Shoshone, ID; Lincoln; Sanders, MT; Adams; Asotin; Columbia; Ferry; Garfield; Lincoln; Pend Oreille; Spokane; Stevens; Whitman, WA; AT 11:55 AM ON NOV 03, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:55 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Emergency Alert System for the Inland Northwest region. In the event of an actual emergency, broadcasters would be bringing you important public safety information. The following tones conclude this test.
